2011 FameLab UK Competition

FameLab is back!

This autumn the uk's biggest search for science communication talent is on...

So, if you can talk science, engineering or maths come along to a regional heat near you or upload a video entry. All it takes is three minutes...

"It has greatly improved my communication skills and increased my confidence"


 

"I came out of it a different person and learnt an enormous amount of stuff in a very short time"
